casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Victor Manuel PEREZ. No. 199P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Victor Manuel Perez. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for the State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of November 2007 by State of NC to File Response to Supplement to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
